name: Outline Agent Evaluation
description: Tests the outline agent's ability to generate a structured slide outline from clarified goals.

parts.text: {"clarifiedContent": "A 30-minute technical presentation on AI in healthcare for medical professionals. Key topics: current applications, future potential, and implementation challenges.", "constraints": {"max_slides": 8}}

{"outline": ["Introduction to AI in Healthcare", "Current AI Diagnostic Applications", "Case Study: AI in Radiology", "The Future of AI in Patient Care", "Key Implementation Challenges", "Building an AI-Ready Infrastructure", "Ethical Considerations in Medical AI", "Conclusion and Next Steps"]}
